function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Misinformation driven majorly by social media, lack of trust in leadership, and sensationalization of inaccurate news."},{"name":"Lack of access to net system leading to devastating impact during crises."},{"name":"Societal and socio-economic gaps exacerbating the impact of health emergencies"},{"name":"Systemic gaps in community
